links.label: The Best of Everything: A Joan Crawford Encyclopedia - Radio Appearances

infos.info: Lackmann has all four of the shows Hollywood Star Preview, Hollywood Star Playhouse, Hollywood Playhouse and Hollywood Star Theater as alternate names of the same program. The listing of many of the persons in Hollywood Star Playhouse comes from his article. Hickerson lists these as three separate programs with Hollywood Star Theater and Hollywood Star Preview (for 9/28/47-8/15/48) as alternate names of the same program. - He also writes that ' from 7/3/40-10/2/40 program [Hollywood Playhouse] called Promoting Priscilla.'

Lackmann has all four of the shows Hollywood Star Preview, Hollywood Star Playhouse, Hollywood Playhouse and Hollywood Star Theater as alternate names of the same program. The listing of many of the persons comes from his article. Hickerson lists these as three separate programs with Hollywood Star Theater and Hollywood Star Preview as alternate names of the same program. - Hickerson also writes that the two programs Hollywood Star Playhouse 2/24/52-2/15/53 and Hollywood Star Theater 10/2/48-4/1/50 were aka Baker's Theater of Stars.
